docs.snippet: No American woman has won the New York City Marathon since 1977, and Meb Keflezighi, in 2009, became the first American man to win the event since Alberto Salazar in 1982....
docs.lead_paragraph: No American woman has won the New York City Marathon since 1977, and Meb Keflezighi, in 2009, became the first American man to win the event since Alberto Salazar in 1982.
